meanings.definition: A cotton fabric, usually woven in stripes or checks.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pretty gingham dress to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The tablecloth at the party was made of gingham.
meanings.sent3: The gingham curtains made the room feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The gingham pattern on the blanket reminded her of a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent5: The gingham fabric felt soft and cool against her skin.

meanings.definition: A clothing pattern characterized by a checkered design.
meanings.sent1: He chose a gingham shirt for his casual outing.
meanings.sent2: The baby's onesie had a cute gingham print.
meanings.sent3: The gingham pajamas made him look like a walking checkerboard.
meanings.sent4: Her gingham scarf added a touch of charm to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The gingham pattern on the skirt was eye-catching and stylish.
